author: Fernando Figueroa
description: The dark rum float atop this elongated rum sour makes the first few sips so good that you'll want another to experience the best bit again.
name: The Fernando
recipeIngredient: 45 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 3-5 years
20 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into ice-filled glass
TOP with soda and then FLOAT dark rum
